title: Belarusian balloons full of cigarettes pose NATO’s latest security threat
summary_full: A rising number of incursions into NATO airspace has led some officials to allege an escalation of Russian hybrid attacks against the alliance and the European Union.
summary_public: A rising number of incursions into NATO airspace has led some officials to allege an escalation of Russian hybrid attacks against the alliance and the European Union.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: escalation of Russian hybrid attacks against the alliance and the European Union
